nodes.text: The Millennium Falcon is a "Pop-Up" book by John Whitman published in September 1997 through Little Brown & Co.
Turboloaser bolts fly past the hull of the Millennium Falcon...

The fastest ship in the galaxy is under attack! In this electrifying 3-D adventure, Han Solo fights against time to save the Millennium Falcon from complete destruction. As the Imperial Star Destroyer looms ever closer, pelting the Falcon with laser blasts, Han struggles to repair the hyperdrive before his ship and all on board are annihilated. But time is running out... Here's another fantastic pop-up pull-tab adventure for all Star Wars fans.

The crew of the Millennium Falcon were traveling when an Imperial-class Star Destroyer arrived. The hyperdrive motivator gave out, and Han Solo scrambled among the junk aboard his ship to fix the hyperdrive, jumping away just in time.
